{{Wired embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-PA7010 |ean=6935364099220, 0845973099244 |asin=B06WP2ZT5N |newegg=N82E16833704367 |type=Powerline Adapter |pwr_vac=true |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM60350 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |flags=HomePlug AV2, SISO }} {{TagLine|AV1000 Gigabit Powerline}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/cat-18_TL-PA7010-KIT.html}} {{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=TL-PA7010-KIT}}
Sold as the TP-LINK TL-PA7010 KIT which comes :with two 2-port TL-PA7010 adapters. CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM60350
*[https://us.hardware.info/reviews/7837/8/14-gigabit-powerline-adapters-review-tp-link ''TP-LINK PowerLine Adapters'' on '''Hardware.info'''] *[https://us.hardware.info/products/3925/9609-homeplug-av-2-powerline-adapters ''Homeplug AV 2 PowerLine Adapters'' on '''Hardware.info''']
